name: Flask of Moxie
summary: UNIQUE ACTIVE: Increases Maximum Health by 135 for 120 seconds. In addition you regain 0.6% of your Maximum Health per second while in combat. This effect persists through death.

name: Vitality Potion
summary: ACTIVE: Heal for 150 Health over 15 seconds.

name: Flask of Prowess
summary: UNIQUE ACTIVE: Increases Power by 15 and Haste by 25 for 120 seconds. This effect persists through death.

name: Flask of Foresight
summary: UNIQUE ACTIVE: Allows you to sense the presence of nearby enemy Shapers for 240 seconds. The eye will shift from blue to yellow to red as enemies draw closer. This effect persists through death.

name: Hunger
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Life Leech:
Dealing damage causes you to restore 5 Health. The amount healed is doubled against shapers. This effect has a 0.5 second cooldown.

name: Life
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Consume I:
When a nearby enemy dies there is a 33% chance that you will be healed for 3 Health. The amount healed is doubled for melee shapers.

name: Resilience
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Toughness I:
Reduces the damage taken from basic attacks by 3. The reduction is doubled against shapers. Every stack after the first is only 50% as effective as the last.

name: Will
passive1: Stackable Passive - Void: Attempts to reduce any magical damage taken by 10%. The amount of magical damage reduced cannot exceed 10 damage. When stacked, the reduction for every Void beyond the first is only 50% as effective as the previous stack.

name: Vigor
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Consume II:
When a nearby enemy dies there is a 66% chance that you will be healed for 7 Health. The amount healed is doubled for melee shapers.

name: Purity
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Transfusion:
You transfuse the allied shaper with the lowest health percentage within 800 range, healing them for 30 Health. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

name: Pride
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Blaze:
Your basic attacks set the target ablaze, causing them to take 30 magical damage over 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

name: Prosperity
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Consume III:
When a nearby enemy dies there is a 100% chance that you will be healed for 12 Health. The amount healed is doubled for melee shapers.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Endless Bounty:
Every 60 seconds, you gain 15 Health, 2 Armor, and 1.5 Magic Resistance. These bonuses stack up to 10 times.

name: Defiance
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Consume III:
When a nearby enemy dies there is a 100% chance that you will be healed for 12 Health. The amount healed is doubled for melee shapers.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Cornered Beast:
When you drop below 25% Health all of your non-ultimate abilities have their cooldowns reset and as long as you remain below 25% Health you gain 50% cooldown reduction.

name: Rampancy
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Consume III:
When a nearby enemy dies there is a 100% chance that you will be healed for 12 Health. The amount healed is doubled for melee shapers.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Juggernaut:
You gain X bonus Power.

The bonus Power is equal to 1.50% of your maximum Health.

name: Harmony
passive1:
Unique Passive - Symbiosis:
Nearby allied shapers gain 10 Health Regen and Symbiosis. When allies under the influence of Symbiosis deal damage your cooldowns are reduced by 0.25 seconds. Whenever you deal damage, allies under the influence of Symbiosis gain 20 Power for 2 seconds.

The cooldown reduction effect can only be triggered once every 0.5 seconds.

name: Devotion
passive1:
Unique Passive - Devotion Aura:
You and nearby allied shapers gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resistance. Additionally, you will heal the allied shaper with the lowest health percentage within the aura for 45 (+20% Power). This healing effect has a 15 second cooldown.

name: Pestilence
passive1:
Unique Passive - Plague Host:
The closest allied shaper within 800 units gains 10 Health Regen and becomes a Plague Carrier, infecting enemies whenever they deal damage. The infection reduces the victim's movement speed by 20% and deals 75 (+40% Power) magical damage over 2 seconds. Can only affect the same target once every 4 seconds.

name: Glory
passive1:
Unique Passive - Blazing Aura:
You are wreathed in flame, dealing 20 (+1.5% max hp) magical damage per second to nearby enemies. The additional bonus damage is equal to 1% of your maximum Health.

name: Vengeance
passive1:
Unique Passive - Hellfire:
Your basic attacks ignite the target, dealing 30 magical damage over 3 seconds and stacking up to 3 times. Every third attack against a target affected by Hellfire will cause the target to erupt with flame, dealing 75 (+30% Power) magical damage to each enemy within 500 units.

name: Rebirth
passive1:
Unique Passive - Ashborn:
When you drop below 30% Health, you surge with lifeforce, recovering (30% max HP) Health over 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

The amount of health recovered is equal to 30% of your maximum Health.

name: Creation
passive1:
Unique Passive - Vital Blessing:
Increases the effectiveness of lifedrain, regen, and healing effects on you by 30%.

name: Vibrance
passive1:
Unique Passive - Wellspring:
For every 1% Health you are missing your Health Regen is increased by 1%.

name: Form
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Vanguard:
Your abilities will deal an additional damage equal to 10% of your Armor. This bonus is only 33% as effective for Damage Over Time abilities.

name: Integrity
passive1:
Unique Passive - Toughness II:
Reduces the damage taken from basic attacks by 8%.

name: Discipline
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Inner Peace:
Dealing damage calms the target, reducing their Power by 10 for 3 seconds.

name: Resolve
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Shield Wall:
When you drop below 50% Health, you gain 35 Armor and 35 Magic Resistance for 4 seconds. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

name: Adamance
passive1: Unique Passive - Lockdown: Taking physical damage from enemy shapers builds a stack of Lockdown for 4 seconds. At 5 stacks Lockdown will activate, reducing any nearby enemies' movespeed by 30% and attack speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
passive2: Stackable Passive - Vanguard: Your abilities will deal an additional damage equal to 10% of your Armor. This bonus is only 33% as effective for Damage Over Time abilities.

name: Preservation
passive1:
Unique Passive - Ablative Armor:
You gain five stacks of Ablation, increasing your Power by 5 per stack for a total of 30 bonus Power. Enemy Shaper basic attacks remove one stack of Ablation but are reduced in damage by 15% in the process. Ablation stacks are refreshed upon exiting combat.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Vanguard:
Your abilities will deal an additional damage equal to 10% of your Armor. This bonus is only 33% as effective for Damage Over Time abilities.

name: Order
passive1:
Unique Passive - Toughness III:
Reduces the damage taken from basic attacks by 15%.

name: Equilibrium
passive1:
Unique Passive - Subdue:
Dealing damage will reduce the target's Power by 10 and attack speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

name: Subjugation
passive1:
Unique Passive - Power Lock:
Dealing damage reduces the target's Power by 10 and all damage they deal by 10% for 3 seconds.

name: Empathy
passive1:
Unique Passive - Life Link:
Redirects 10% of the damage nearby allied shapers would take to you instead. This effect deactivates when you are below 25% Health.

name: Hope
passive1:
Unique Passive - Avatar:
When you drop below 50% Health, you gain (+50% Armor) Armor, (+50% Magic Resistance) Magic Resistance, and 10% Damage Reduction for 3 seconds. Damaging an enemy extends this effect by 1 seconds, to a maximum of 6 seconds. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

name: Conviction
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Fervor:
Taking damage from an enemy shaper will cause you to regenerate 40 Health over 10 seconds.

name: Balance
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Will Thief:
Dealing damage causes you to steal the target's Magic Resistance, reducing it by 3 and increasing yours by the same amount for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

name: Freedom
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Tenacity:
Reduces the duration of all disabling effects except for suppression by 30%.

name: Faith
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Fervor:
Taking damage from an enemy shaper will cause you to regenerate 40 Health over 10 seconds.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Arcane Aegis:
Every 3 seconds you will gain a shield that absorbs up to 25 magical damage. This effect will continue to stack until the shield reaches a value of 375.

name: Retribution
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Fervor:
Taking damage from an enemy shaper will cause you to regenerate 40 Health over 10 seconds.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Mage Slayer:
10% of the raw magical damage that would be dealt to you is stored instead. The stored damage is released as bonus magic damage on your next basic attack.

name: Betrayal
passive1:
Unique Passive - Contempt:
Your basic attacks deal an additional 40 bonus magical damage.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Will thief:
Dealing damage causes you to steal the target's Magic Resistance, reducing it by 3 and increasing yours by the same amount for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

name: Oppression
passive1:
Unique Passive - Despair Aura:
Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced by 15.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Will Thief:
Dealing damage causes you to steal the target's Magic Resistance, reducing it by 3 and increasing yours by the same amount for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

name: Valor
passive1:
Unique Passive - Last Stand:
Grants bonus Power based on your missing health, up to a maximum of 40 Power. Additionally, when you would drop below 30% Health, you will first gain a shield that absorbs 350 damage for 5 seconds. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Will Thief:
Dealing damage causes you to steal the target's Magic Resistance, reducing it by 3 and increasing yours by the same amount for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

name: Stability
passive1:
Unique Passive - Swift Recovery:
You gain 40% bonus movement speed for 1 seconds whenever a disabling effect expires from you (does not include slows).
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Tenacity:
Reduces the duration of all disabling effects except for suppression by 30%.

name: Momentum
passive1:
Unique Passive - Unshakable:
Every 30 seconds you will gain a shield that will prevent the first disabling effect used against you.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Tenacity:
Reduces the duration of all disabling effects except for suppression by 35%.

name: Might
passive1:
Unique Passive - Soul Collector:
Killing a minion, creature, or worker permanently grants 4 bonus Health and 0.5 bonus Power. The bonuses stack up to 30 times.

name: Command
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Surge:
Using an ability grants you 10% increased Power for 4 seconds. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

name: Control
passive1:
Unique Passive - Frost I:
Dealing damage will slow the target for 1 second based on the type of attack used.

Ranged basic attacks: 12.5%
Melee basic attacks: 20%
Single Target Abilities: 17.5%
AoE and DoT Abilities: 7.5%

name: Strife
passive1:
Unique Passive - Soul Master:
Whenever you kill a minion, creature, or worker, you gain permanent bonus Health and Power. The bonuses start at 3 Health and 0.25 Power per stack and decreases by 0.5% for each additional stack. Any previous bonuses from the Soul Collector passive of Might are carried forward and included.

name: Decay
passive1:
Unique Passive - Spirit Burn:
Dealing damage with abilities will deal 6% of the targets maximum Health over 3 seconds as magical damage. Damage against non-shapers cannot exceed 320 total damage.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Soul Collector:
Killing a minion, creature, or worker permanently grants 4 bonus Health and 0.5 bonus Power. The bonuses stack up to 30 times.

name: Wisdom
passive1:
Unique Passive - Enlightenment:
You permanently have 20% increased Power.

name: Justice
passive1:
Unique Passive - Power Overwhelming:
Using an ability grants you 10% increased Power and Movespeed and 20% increased Haste and Mastery for 3 seconds. This effect has a 2.5 second cooldown.

name: Judgement
passive1:
Unique Passive - Sundering Strikes:
Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resist by 5% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times for a maximum reduction of 20%.

name: Rage
passive1:
Unique Passive - Furious Assault:
Your basic attacks and abilities passively penetrate 50% of your target's bonus defenses.

name: Destruction
passive1:
Unique Passive - Guard Break:
Increases Defense Penetration by 30.

name: Inevitability
passive1:
Unique Passive - Frost II:
Dealing damage will slow the target for 1 second based on the type of attack used.

Ranged basic attacks: 25%
Melee basic attacks: 40%
Single Target Abilities: 35%
AoE and DoT Abilities: 15%

name: Pursuit
passive1:
Unique Passive - Relentless:
Dealing damage to an enemy will reduce their movement speed by 50 and increase your movement speed by 50 for 2 seconds.

name: Hostility
passive1:
Unique Passive - Violence Aura:
You and all nearby allied shapers are granted 15 power and 10 Mastery.

name: Pain
passive1:
Unique Passive - Mortal Strike:
Dealing damage to an enemy will Mortal Strike them, reducing the effects of Heals, Regen, and Lifedrain by 50% for 3 seconds.

name: Dominance
passive1:
Unique Passive - Obliterate:
Your critical strike damage is increased by 50%.

name: Divinity
passive1:
Unique Passive - Prodigy:
Your abilities will overload for an additional 7.5% damage.

name: Abolition
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Precision:
Your basic attacks deal an additional 20 bonus physical damage.

name: Inspiration
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Brilliance:
Your spellbook spells have 10% cooldown reduction.

name: Energy
passive1:
Stackable Passive - Shock:
Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, you also zap them for an additional 20(+50% of bonus Power) magical damage. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

name: Fluidity
passive1:
Unique Passive - Spirit Walk:
You move through units without colliding

name: Influence
passive1:
Unique Passive - Commanding Presence:
Allied shapers within 1200 range move 15% faster while moving towards you.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Unstoppable:
The effects of movement speed slows are reduced by 35%.

name: Impulse
passive1:
Unique Passive - Zealous charge:
Melee Shapers: Issuing an attack command outside of melee basic attack range will cause you to dash to the target.
Ranged Shapers: Issuing an attack command from inside of melee basic attack range will cause you to disengage from the target, dashing away from them. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

name: Conquest
passive1:
Unique Passive - Aftermath:
After using an ability, your next basic attack within 6 seconds will deal 50(+120% Power) additional physical damage. This effect has a 3 second cooldown.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Precision:
Your basic attacks deal an additional 20 bonus physical damage.

name: Ruin
passive1:
Unique Passive - Giant Killer:
Your basic attacks deal an additional 20 (+2% of the target's maximum Health)(+8% of the target's bonus Health) as physical damage. Bonus damage against non-shapers cannot exceed 225 damage hit.

name: Finesse
passive1:
Unique Passive - Exploit Weakness:
Your basic attacks deal an additional 20 bonus physical damage and causes all damage you deal to the target to be increased by 5% for 3 seconds. The damage amplification applies only to your damage and stacks up to 5 times for a total of 25% increased damage.

name: Corruption
passive1:
Unique Passive - Mortal Strike:
Dealing damage to an enemy will Mortal Strike them, reducing the effect of Heals, Regen, and Lifedrain by 50% for 3 seconds.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Brilliance:
Your spellbook spells have 10% cooldown reduction.

name: Furor
passive1:
Unique Passive - Windstrike Aura:
You and all nearby allied shapers have a 25% chance when attacking of triggering an additional basic attack that deals 50% damage.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Brilliance:
Your spellbook spells have 10% cooldown reduction.

name: Grace
passive1:
Unique Passive - Zephyr Aura:
You and nearby allied shapers gain 40% increased movement speed for 3 seconds upon scoring a kill or an assist on an enemy shaper.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Brilliance:
Your spellbook spells have 10% cooldown reduction.

name: Zeal
passive1:
Unique Passive - Fast Forward:
Dealing damage with basic attacks reduces the cooldown of all of your abilities by 0.5 seconds. The cooldown reduction is only half as effective when dealing damage against a non shaper.
passive2:
Stackable Passive - Brilliance:
Your spellbook spells have 10% cooldown reduction.

name: Fate
passive1:
Unique Passive - Collateral Damage:
Dealing damage with basic attacks fires shrapnel at up to 3 enemies near the target, each dealing 40% of the initial damage dealt to the primary target. Fate applies on-hit and other item effects but will not propagate effects that apply only to the primary target.

name: Insight
passive1:
Unique Passive - Eagle eye:
Increases basic attack range by 20%.
passive2:
Unique Passive - Puncture:
Your basic attacks will deal an additional 10% of their damage as true damage, calculated pre-mitigation.

name: Duress
passive1:
Unique Passive - Netherbind:
Basic attacks against enemy shapers will root them for 1 second. This effect has a 15 second cooldown. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown by 1 second. Can only trigger on your primary target. Attempting to root a target with Netherbind that has been affected by a previous Netherbind within the last 5 seconds will result in the root duration being reduced to 50% of the previous root's duration.

name: Potency
passive1:
Unique Passive - Stormcall:
Whenever you damage an enemy with a single-target abilities, they are also struck by lightning that deals magical damage equal to 20 (+50% of bonus Power) plus 5% of the target's Maximum Health. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.

name: Chaos
passive1:
Unique Passive - Chain Lightning:
Dealing damage causes a chain lightning, dealing 75 (+10% of the damage dealt) as magical damage to up to 4 nearby enemies and causes them to take 10% increased magical damage for 3 seconds. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.

name: Resonance
passive1:
Unique Passive - Static Discharge:
Your basic attacks become charged, dealing 15(+10% of bonus Power) bonus magical damage before arcing to random enemy within 450 units of your primary target, dealing magical damage to them equal to 50% of the damage your attack dealt to the primary target.

name: Passion
passive1:
Unique Passive - Blood Fever:
Your abilities have an additional 15% Lifedrain.

name: Ambition
passive1:
Unique Passive - Desperate Thirst:
Grants bonus Haste and Lifedrain based on your missing health, up to a maximum of 30 Haste and 10% Lifedrain.

name: Voracity
passive1:
Unique Passive - Rising Hunger:
Dealing damage with basic attacks grant 7 Power and 1% Lifedrain. This effect stacks up to 5 times for a maximum bonus of 35 Power and 5% Lifedrain. Stacks last 4 seconds.

name: Assimilation
passive1:
Unique Passive - Undying Storm:
Whenever you score a kill or assist on an enemy shaper, you are instantly healed for 100 (+1.0) Health.
